Strong relationship:
    precision-fmeasure (all samples)
    loc-performance (all samples)

Moderate relationship:
    recall-precision (classic vector)
    recall-fmeasure (neural network, extended boolean)
    files-performance (all samples)
    loc-features (all samples)
    features-performance (BM25)
    files-precision (*negative* | BM25)
    files-fmeasure (*negative* | BM25)
    totaltraces-precision (extended boolean)
